articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Solar storm alert! Double solar flare erupts, triggers blackouts over North America - HT Tech
articles.description: A rare double solar flare has erupted on the sunspot AR3296. A CME cloud has escaped, raising fears for a major solar storm on Earth.
articles.content: The Earth-facing side of the Sun has become a hotbed of intense solar activity. Due to the negative polarity of a sunspot complex, a large region has been continuously exploding since the last week. … [+2207 chars]
